    Talks & Courses

    Below is a list of my recent talks and courses. Each entry includes links to related materials (repositories, slides, or documents) and highlights key takeaways.

    Financial Literacy with Claire

    Type: Talk

    I have a real passion for financial literacy, so I'm sometimes asked to present on the basics, for example for university students or internally at my current company. In this talk, I go over the essentials: budgeting, saving and investing. It's a short and light-hearted talk about how we can start working on our financial plans


    Slides

    Computational modeling of goal-directed and habitual reinforcement-learning strategies

    Type: Workshop

    At the Flux 2021 conference, together with one of my supervisors we taught a workshop on computational modeling to neuroscientists. We developed a Python tutorial with exercises and solutions, and demonstrated how we can simulate both model-free and model-based behaviour. The full workshop is available on my Github and is open access.
